src:
Milojević citirao Duleta posle poraza od Budućnosti
“Izgubiti od Budućnosti, Cedevita Olimpije kod kuće, Crvene zvezde i FMP-a u gostima zaista se ne mogu tumačiti kao kiksevi, jer su to objektivno bolje ekipe od nas”, jasno će Megin strateg

03 Nov 2019

Teškim porazom od Budućnosti Mega je nastavila seriju loših rezultata, ali trener Dejan Milojević ne odustaje od svog tima, inače najmlađeg od nastanka kluba.
Mladi stručnjak svestan je da je gost iz Podgorice u ovom trenutku jak rival za Megu."Čestitam ekipi Budućnosti na pobedi. Osim prve četvrtine, sve ostalo je bilo za zaborav i završilo se ovako kako se završilo. Ako iz svega ovoga može da se izvuče nešto pozitivno, to je da mi nemamo pravi kiks. Izgubiti od Budućnosti, Cedevita Olimpije kod kuće, Crvene zvezde i FMP-a u gostima zaista se ne mogu tumačiti kao kiksevi, jer su to objektivno bolje ekipe od nas. Međutim, način na koji igramo je problematičan i zato moramo da se trgnemo i mečeve koji će nam odlčučivati borbu za opstanak odigramo mnogo bolje. Skor od četiri poraza i jedne pobede je loš, ali dobra stvar je što smo konkurenta u toj borbi za opstanak Zadar pobedili 24 poena razlike. Idemo dalje", izjavio je Milojević.
Na pitanje novinara o psihološkom problemu ekipe Milojević je citirao Duška Vujoševića."Cerovina i Macura su odlučno uzimali šuteve i zato su pogađali. Svaki put kad se dvoumiš to je u najvećem broju slučajeva promašaj. Kada preskačeš dobre šuteve ništa dobro se ne dešava. Budućnost je imala dobar šuterski dan, ali mi smo se predali kad su poveli više od 10 poena razlike. Jedino rešenje za nas je da nastavimo dobro da treniramo. Duško Vujošević ima jednu izreku koja kaže: 'Ekipe koje treniraju jako, ne predaju se tako lako'. To će biti naš recept. Istina je da mi ne treniramo slabo, ali ono što nedostaje je veće samopuzdanje prilikom tih šuteva. Ovo nisu igrači koji nemaju šut, samo je su izgubili samopuzdanje koje ćemo treningom morati da vratimo", poručio je Megin strateg.
Foto: MN Press
text:
Milojevic quoted Dulet after his defeat to Future
“Losing from the Future, Cedevit Olympia at home, Red Star and the away FMP cannot really be interpreted as kicks, because they are objectively better teams than us,” Megin's strategist clearly

03 Nov 2019

With a heavy defeat from the Future, Mega continued a series of poor results, but coach Dejan Milojevic does not give up his team, the youngest since the club's inception.
The young expert is aware that the guest from Podgorica is a strong rival for Mega at the moment. "Congratulations to the Future team on the win. Except for the first quarter, everything else was forgettable and ended the way it ended. If you can make it out of all this something positive is that we do not have the right matchbox. Losing from the Future, Cedevit Olympia at home, Red Star and FMP away can really not be interpreted as cupcakes, because they are objectively better teams than us. we play problematic and that is why we have to race and play matches that will make our survival struggle much better.The score of four defeats and one victory is bad, but the good thing is that we have won 24 points in the competition in the survival of Zadar. Let's move on, "Milojevic said.
Asked by a reporter about the psychological problem of the team, Milojevic quoted Dusko Vujosevic. "Cerovina and Macura took firm shots, so they guessed. had a good shooting day, but we gave up when they made more than 10 points difference.The only solution for us is to continue to train well.Dusko Vujosevic has one saying that: 'Teams that train hard don't give up so easily "It's going to be our recipe. It's true that we don't train poorly, but what we lack is greater confidence in those shots. These are not players who don't have a shot, they just lost the confidence that we will have to regain with training," Megin said. strategist.
Photo: MN Press
